channel.title: Talks on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Home

item.title: Flexible Workforce, Inner Sourcing, or Code Dumping?
item.description: In this talk at The LEGO Group’s DevCon25, our internal global developer conference, LP and I gave a talk entitled: “Flexible Workforce, Inner Sourcing, or Code Dumping?: How a cross product engineering team assembled, delivered value, and then dissolved.”

item.title: Depression and Flow
item.description:
On June 16, I was fortunate enough to give my first conference workshop, entitled “Going with the Flow: Increasing Mindfulness and Flow Experiences to Fight Burnout and Depression” at Wordcamp Europe. I gave the workshop in partnership with Open Sourcing Mental Illness, a non-profit working to raise awareness of mental health issues in the tech industry.

I created a repo with summarized information and resources, and I’ll be sure to post a video when it becomes available.
